text: Adam snatched the backpack and started running. Followe by Bessie and quite angried shop owner.
What followed then was the greatest prusue the village experienced ever!
Mysterios backpack thief Adam runing upfrom, jumping fences, skipping stone and flying around others. Followed by Lady Fluffbal Bessie, effortlessly keep up the pace.
And behind them, trying to catch a breath the BBEG the dealer.
Of course, as is expected from a proper adventurer, in the end Adam returned the backpack to the dealer.
And so conclude first of many Adam's adventures.
